name: DemonCube
description:
Hello, this is small project I have been working on for my studies.

In this game you play as the His Cubeness, the dark DemonCube.
You have been captured and now must escape and defeat the Warden.

You will need to jump around in the overworld and defeat enemies in combat.
Beware, your time is short! But every time you die you manifest a new body and can use the souls you have collected to increase your time in the world.
